message: Hey, are you still on for the meeting at 3 PM?
Yes, absolutely! I'll have the presentation ready by then.
Perfect. Did you get a chance to review the Q3 report I sent?
I did, the numbers look great! I had a question about the marketing budget though.
We can dive into that during the meeting. I'll send the detailed breakdown now.
By the way, are you going to the company picnic next week?
I wouldn't miss it! I heard they're having a barbecue contest.
Haha, I'm entering. My secret recipe will win for sure.
We'll see about that! I'm pretty confident in my skills.
It's on! Looking forward to it. See you at 3.
Quick question before the meeting - should I bring printed copies of the slides?
No, we're doing it digitally. Just bring your laptop.
Got it, thanks for the confirmation!
